        this function is used to match couples and form couples according to each individuals need and constraints. in it a girl selects a boy then a boy selects a girl and so on..
        Parameters:
        man - this array represents all the boys as read from the boys.csv
        women - this array represents all the girls as read from girls.csv
        couples - this array represents all the couples from
        Returns:
        the number of couples matched

        java.io.IOException
